subject: Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
Athletics and Sports
Baseball
organizations: Texas High School Baseball Coaches Association
lead_paragraph: The Texas High School Baseball Coaches Association finds itself in an awkward position, forced to deliver an early verdict on Roger Clemens, who is scheduled to speak at their convention.
snippet: The Texas High School Baseball Coaches Association finds itself in an awkward position, forced to deliver an early verdict on Roger Clemens, who is scheduled to speak at their convention.
